thread.title: Rosie O'Donnell and Michelle Rounds reach divorce settlement
thread.title_full: Rosie O'Donnell and Michelle Rounds reach divorce settlement - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Rosie O'Donnell and Michelle Rounds reach divorce settlement
text:
Noam Galai/Getty Images “It's done. We've settled. There's peace in the Middle East,” said Rosie O’Donnell as she walked out of Manhattan Supreme court. Rosie O’Donnell and Michelle Rounds have finally reached a divorce settlement.
“It's done. We've settled. There's peace in the Middle East,” a tired-looking O’Donnell said Wednesday as she walked out of Manhattan Supreme court. We're both very happy about the outcome. Thank you everyone."
Rounds, who came out of the courthouse about 10 minutes later, said she felt “good about it.”
ROSIE O'DONNELL TRIES TO BAN REPORTERS AT DIVORCE COURT IN MANHATTAN
Rounds’ lawyer, William London, said the pair has joint legal custody of their 2-year-old daughter, Dakota.
"We're happy with everything. It's over,” he said.
Alec Tabak/for New York Daily News Rosie O'Donnel walks to court with her lawyers on June 24, 2015 in New York. Alec Tabak/for New York Daily News Michelle Rounds and her ex-wife Rosie O'Donnel appeared for a hearing in their custody dispute. Previous Next Enlarge Further terms of the settlement were not disclosed.
O'Donnell had filed for divorce from Rounds in February.
The past two months have been brutal for the 53-year-old comedian.
Rounds allegedly attempted suicide in September. In August, O’Donnell’s estranged father died and her teenage daughter Chelsea abruptly left home.
O’Donnell said Chelsea ran away, but the teen has claimed that her mother kicked her out of the house. Chelsea then publicly slammed O’Donnell, calling her “not genuine.”
ROSIE O'DONNELL GETS EMOTIONAL TALKING ABOUT CHELSEA, SAYS DAUGHTER HAS 'CHEMICAL IMBALANCE'
A former “View” producer sued O’Donnell earlier this month, claiming she is a bully.
"I spent every day this week in therapy in the midst of the bulls---. What has happened with my life?" she reportedly said Saturday during a standup show at Gotham Comedy Club in New York.
"Five months ago I was a married woman and Donald Trump was a reality star. Now my world has blown up. He is the Republican front-runner, and the zombie apocalypse is upon us."
Related Stories Trump bashes Rosie O'Donnell during GOP debate Rosie O'Donnell’s daughter Chelsea slams mom Ex-'View' producer was 'scared' of Rosie O'Donnell: lawsuit Tags: rosie o'donnell
